sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { StyleSheet, Text, TouchableOpacity, View, useWindowDimensions } from 'react-native'

export default function SideBarMenu() {

    const {width, height} = useWindowDimensions()

    const styles = StyleSheet.create({
        SideBarContainer: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'column',
            justifyContent: 'flex-start',
            alignItems: 'center',
            position: 'absolute',
            top: 0,
            left: 0,
            backgroundColor: '#fff',
            minWidth: 0.6*width,
            maxWidth: 0.6* width,
            minHeight: height,
            maxHeight: height,
            zIndex: 20
        },
        SiderBarHeader: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'column',
            justifyContent: 'flex-start',
            alignItems: 'center',
            minHeight: 0.1* height,
            maxHeight: 0.1* height,
        },
        MenuTitleText: {
            fontSize: 17,
    
        },
        MenuItemsContainer: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'column',
            justifyContent: 'flex-start',
            alignItems: 'center',
            minHeight: 0.9* height,
            maxHeight: 0.9* height,
            minWidth: 0.6*width,
            maxWidth: 0.6* width,
    
        },
        MenuItem: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'column',
            justifyContent: 'center',
            alignItems: 'center',
            backgroundColor: '#432636',
            minWidth: 0.6*width,
            maxWidth: 0.6* width,
            minHeight: 0.06*height,
            maxHeight: 0.06*height
        }
        
    
    })

    return (
        <View style={styles.SideBarContainer}>
            <View style={styles.SiderBarHeader}>
                <Text style={styles.MenuTitleText}>Menu</Text>
            </View>
            <View style={styles.MenuItemsContainer}>
                <TouchableOpacity style={styles.MenuItem}> 
                    <Text>Join Room</Text>
                </TouchableOpacity>
                <TouchableOpacity style={styles.MenuItem}> 
                    <Text>Create Room</Text>
                </TouchableOpacity>
                <TouchableOpacity style={styles.MenuItem}> 
                    <Text>Dummy Option</Text>
                </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
        </View>
    )
}
